title: create​
content: </> Bloxios.create(config: RequestConfig) → BloxiosInstance Creates a new Bloxios instance with the specified configuration

title: URL​
content: </> interface URL { isValid: boolean href: string protocol: string port: string hostname: string host: string pathname: string search: string searchParams: {[string]: string} path: string hash: string } An object describing the URL

title: RequestConfig​
content: </> interface RequestConfig { url: string urlObject: URL method: string baseURL: string headers: {[string]: string} cookies: {[string]: string} params: {[string]: any} data: {[string]: any} instance: BloxiosInstance } Request Config for the request

title: ResponseSchema​
content: </> interface ResponseSchema { data: {[string]: any} status: number statusText: string headers: {[string]: string} config: RequestConfig } The response schema for requests

title: request​
content: </> BloxiosInstance:request(config: RequestConfig) → Promise<BloxiosResponse> Creates a Http request with Bloxios

title: get​
content: alias </> BloxiosInstance:get( url: string, config: RequestConfig ) → Promise<BloxiosResponse> Creates a Http GET request with Bloxios

title: delete​
content: alias </> BloxiosInstance:delete( url: string, config: RequestConfig ) → Promise<BloxiosResponse> Creates a Http DELETE request with Bloxios

content: alias </> BloxiosInstance:head( url: string, config: RequestConfig ) → Promise<BloxiosResponse> Creates a Http HEAD request with Bloxios

title: options​
content: alias </> BloxiosInstance:options( url: string, config: RequestConfig ) → Promise<BloxiosResponse> Creates a Http OPTIONS request with Bloxios

title: post​
content: alias </> BloxiosInstance:post( url: string, data: {[string]: any}, config: RequestConfig ) → Promise<BloxiosResponse> Creates a Http POST request with Bloxios

title: put​
content: alias </> BloxiosInstance:put( url: string, data: {[string]: any}, config: RequestConfig ) → Promise<BloxiosResponse> Creates a Http PUT request with Bloxios

title: patch​
content: alias </> BloxiosInstance:patch( url: string, data: {[string]: any}, config: RequestConfig ) → Promise<BloxiosResponse> Creates a Http PATCH request with Bloxios
